parameters.name: BIsMirrorView
parameters.description: True if the view is mirrored, false if not

parameters.name: LMirrorViewOrientation
parameters.description: Orientation of the mirror view as defined in swMirrorViewPositions_e

title: IView.GetMirrorViewOrientation
description: Gets whether this view is mirrored.
signature:
System.Boolean GetMirrorViewOrientation( 
   out System.Boolean
BIsMirrorView
,
   out System.Int32
LMirrorViewOrientation
)

parameters.name: BIsMirrorView
parameters.description: True if the view is mirrored, false if not

parameters.name: LMirrorViewOrientation
parameters.description: Orientation of the mirror view as defined in swMirrorViewPositions_e

returns: True if the method executed successfully, false if not
